comments.raw_text:
At the moment we store an object which is very similar to what we can find on the targetFront.
Having the targetFront directly would be easier to handle.
We need to add a `type` and a `isTopLevel` properties to the target in order to be abler to do that.
comments.author: nchevobbe@mozilla.com
comments.creator: nchevobbe@mozilla.com

comments.raw_text:
This means we had to create a `targetType` and a `isTopLevel` properties
on the targets.
